titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the H.E Butti Bin Bishr Collection AD.MC.093
titlestmt.author: Jasmine Soliman and Emily Broad

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-02-03 19:03:02 +0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: H.E Butti Bin Bishr Collection

physdesc.extent: 470 loose photographic prints, 1 negative and 7 albums containing 252 photographic prints. Mainly colour photographs with some black and white. Some with significant curling or warping, but none that prohibit digitization.
36 letters, memos, certificates and ID documents

scopecontent.head: Content Description
scopecontent.p: A (digital surrogate) collection of 723 photographs and 36 related documents from the collection of H.E. Butti Bin Bishr, created and collected during his time working in the court of H.H. Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan in the 1960s and early 1970s.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: HE Butti Bin Bishr, who was born on Muharram 21, 1360 AH (May 18, 1941 AD), passed away on Rabi al Awwal 1432 (February 22, 2011). After working as the director of the Oman Bank in Al Ain, HE Butti Bin Bishr occupied a number of different administrative positions at the court of the late HH Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan, before becoming private secretary and then the director of his Office.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) are held by Maryam Al Falasi, the collection owner. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from them via the repository. Please contact Akkasah: Photography Archive at NYUAD at akkasah@nyu.edu or complete the image request form at akkasah.org

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Digital surrogates only are held by the repository. Please contact Akkasah Photography Archive, akkasah@nyu.edu +971 2628 5531

did.unittitle: From the top left clockwise: two views of performances to celebrate the arrival of the Emirati Delegation to a country overseas, and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (middle) talking with a man.

From the top left clockwise: a group of school girls dancing with the UAE and Kuwaiti flag to celebrate the opening of a new school; a woman and man performing in costumes at the reception of the Emirati Delegation overseas; H.H. Sheikh Mubarak Bin Hamed Al Nahyan, H.H. Sheikh Tahnoun bin Mohammed Al Nahyan, H.E. Butti Bin Bishr, and an unidentified man performing at an Al Ayala dance.

From the top down: a gate with a welcoming message for Sheikh Zayed, H.E. Butti Bin Bishr flipping through a book in his office in Al Ain, From the left: H.E. Ahmed Al Nasroud, H.E. Butti Bin Bishr greeting Emir Issa bin Salman Al Khalifa of Bahrain, and H.E. Ahmed Al Hamed (middle) at the Abu Dhabi Airport.

did.unittitle: Festivals and Delegations
The front cover of "Festivals and Delegations from the 1960s and early 1970s."
The inside front cover of "Festivals and Delegations from the 1960s and early 1970s."
The index of "Festivals and Delegations from the 1960s and early 1970s."
A blank page in "Festivals and Delegations from the 1960s and early 1970s."
From the top left clockwise: two views of H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (middle) at an Al Ayala dance celebration, H.E. Butti Bin Bishr on a dirt road, and a studio portrait of H.E. Butti Bin Bishr.

Top: From the left: an unidentified man, H.E. Butti Bin Bishr, H.E. Sheikh Hamdan Bin Rashid, an unidentified man, H.E. Sheikh Maktoum Bin Rashid, H.E. Ahmed Al Suwaidi, and three representatives of Dubai receiving a delegation from a foreign country. Bottom: men at an Al Ayala dance celebration in Abu Dhabi.

From the top left clockwise: a studio portrait of H.E. Butti Bin Bishr; from the left: a group portrait of two unidentified men, H.E. Sheikh Hamdan Bin Rashid, an unidentified man, H.E. Sheikh Maktoum Bin Rashid, and H.E. Ahmed Al Suwaidi receiving a delegation from a foreign country; H.E. Butti Bin Bishr in a storefront; and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr with another man on a dirt road.

Top, from the left: H.E. Sheikh Mubarak Al Nahyan, Ahmad Bin Khalifa Al Yousef, and H.E. Saeed Al Darmaki at an Al Ayala dance. Bottom right: a studio portrait of an unidentified man and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (right).

From the top down: a group of men at an Al Ayala dance; a group portrait, including H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (first row, second from the right) on his first day working for Sheikh Zayed; from the left: H.E. Butti Bin Bishr, two unidentified men, H.E. Ahmed Al Suwaidi, H.E. Ahmed Bin Sulayem, and an unidentified man receiving a delegation from a foreign country.
From the top down: two views of H.E. Saeed Al Darmaki dancing Al Ayala with a boy, and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr carrying a sword next to an unidentified man at an Al Ayala dance.

Top: a gathering for the reception of Hussein Bin Talal (H.E. Butti Bin Bishr and H.E. Saeed Al Darmaki stand behind him). Bottom: H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nahyan greeting Hussein Bin Talal and the Jordanian delegation, including H.E. Butti Bin Bishr and H.E. Saeed Al Darmaki in the background.
